name: Paintball.io Mayhem
description:
Time for an awesome game, where you will play the most ultimate game play and might be shell shocked after doing so. Introducing Paintball.io, where you can be the ultimate warrior and fight out other players in an epic battle for survival.

Features
- Awesome twitchy game play
- So many shell shocked characters pick from
- Be the ultimate arena shooter
- Make friends and become a squad.io to battle other enemies
